intro: A New Evolution of Harvest Moon!
description:
In Harvest Moon: The Lost Valley, you will have to discover why the Lost Valley is cursed in a perpetual winter. With the Harvest Goddess nowhere to be found, and the Harvest Sprites locked away, it's up to you – an unlikely farmer who was caught unexpectedly in one of the Lost Valley’s fierce snowstorms – to discover the source of this curse, and bring the seasons back to the Lost Valley!

Plant crops, raise cows, chickens, and sheep, foster relationships with locals, and even woo a future spouse! Marry, have a child, and unlock the full potential of all seven Harvest Sprites, along with the Harvest Goddess and Harvest God – all inside a world where the land is customized by you!

•	Grow crops and raise animals like cows, chickens, and sheep! 
•	Unleash your creativity with 3D terrain customization—dig, build, and reshape the land! 
•	Unlock the power of seven Harvest Sprites, the Harvest Goddess, and the Harvest God! 
•	Build lasting relationships with the villagers, find love, marry, and start a family! 
•	Enjoy extra outfits, buildings, crops, and characters with all DLC included!
